exceptions.exn: Cannot coerce apply to an evaluable reference.

original: intros a b. unfold SysPrf. unfold equal. unfold Plus. unfold Succ. unfold apply. apply eqTrans with (Plus a (Succ b)) (Succ (Plus a b)). - apply eqPlus. + apply eqRefl. + apply eqSucc, eqPlus, eqRefl. - apply eqSym, pa2, eqPlus, eqRefl, eqRefl.
